name: Lunchbox Critters
description:
There is no end to the onslaught of bugs.
They will eventually get your lunch. Get as many bites in before they do.
Bugs come in from the right side and steal your picnic on the left.
You lose when they drag your lunch back to the their base.
...
Your sandwich is now theirs.

Buttons:

ESCAPE: Pause game
Left click: Use item
Arrow keys (or WASD): Move camera.

[1-5]: Select Item
1: Fly Swatter - Kills bugs in small radius. Quick refresh.
2: Bug Zapper - Stays on map killing bugs that come near.
3: Fly Paper - Stays on map slowing bugs that come near.
4: Off-Brand Raid - Stays on map stunning bugs that come near.
5: Pesticide Bomb - Kills a wide area of bugs. Slow refresh.
